snippet: With the L train operating at only a handful of stations in the borough and the G line closed since Hurricane Sandy, some commuters are turning to alternatives like bikes and ferries.
abstract: Some Brooklyn subway commuters are turning to alternate forms of transportation, like bikes and ferries, with the L train operating at only a handful of stations in the borough and the G line closed since Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: With the L train operating at only a handful of stations in the borough and the G line closed since Hurricane Sandy, some commuters are turning to alternatives like bikes and ferries.

headline.seo: As Subway System Is Revived, Some Brooklyn Riders Are Left Behind
headline.main: Some Brooklyn Riders Are Left Behind in Revival of the Subway System
headline.print_headline: Some Brooklyn Riders Are Left Behind in Revival of the Subway System
